Description: VERY GOOD CONDITION, GREAT PLAYER! KOREAN QUALITY! NOT made in Indonesia or China. This is an EPIPHONE FLYING V ELECTRIC GUITAR. Serial number I060315xx. Made in Korea, MIK in the Saein plant, March of 2006. 100% complete and original. The top and back of the guitar are nice, with extremely light handling scratches and some polish swirl. There are light dings around the body edges. The back of the neck is perfectly SMOOTH! The frets and finger board look NEAR NEW! Not much wear for a 10 year old guitar. First class guitar, not stamped 'used' or '2nd' like so many here on ebay. It comes with the SKB canvas hard case you see in the pictures. See the serial number on the back of the headstock. Interestingly, the last two numbers are 58 and it is a '58 reissue. Features include... gold hardware, Grover tuners, 22 fret maple neck, rosewood fingerboard with dot markers, two original humbucker pickups, three way PU selector switch, tun-o-matic bridge, stop tailpiece, natural finish body, three ply white pick guard. The body is mahogany with korina top and back. It is beautiful, and SOUNDS GREAT!!! Professionally set up. Everything works as it should... electronics, truss rod, bridge, tuners, etc. The controls are clean and not scratchy. I have serviced the guitar... cleaned and polished the neck and body, cleaned the fingerboard, cleaned and polished the frets, 9-42 strings, adjusted bridge/truss rod/intonation, etc. She is ready to play and PLAYS GREAT!!Buyer pays $44.95 shipping, insurance, packaging and handling to lower 48 states. Items over 2 lbs will ship Fed Ex ground, (no PO Boxes). Thanks for looking and good luck. Please take a look at my other listings and the last picture I have a great collection of inexpensive, but professional grade guitars listed for sale... a left handed lefty LH Mexican MIM made in Mexico Fender Stratocaster strat in midnight blue with maple neck, a Korean NEAR MINT EPIPHONE LES PAUL STANDARD FLAME TOP TRANS CHERRY LIMITED EDITION electric guitar with gig bag case (SOLD), a made in Korea Epi Korina Flying V 1958 reissue, a near mint SG G-400 LIMITED EDITION CUSTOM SHOP 1966 REISSUE with original hard shell case (SOLD), a NEAR MINT EPIPHONE LES PAUL STANDARD in Cardinal Red (SOLD) and an exceptional transparent cherry red Ibanez AS73 TCR-12-01 semi hollow es 335 style electric guitar (SOLD).The following is common sense stuff, but needs mentioned: -If you have a concern with any item purchased, CONTACT ME IMMEDIATELY by phone or email. I always offer a full refund of the purchase amount. You should not have to live with something you are unhappy with for any reason. If you alter, modify, change or "repair" the item in anyway without my consent, you are accepting the item "as is", at the price paid. All items are packed for safety. Often requiring reassembly, tuning and/or adjusting. -If you receive an item that has been damaged in shipping, CONTACT ME IMMEDIATELY and save all the packaging. We will work through the claim together until things are right. -I can ship almost anywhere, but free shipping or a fixed shipping price is for the contiguous 48 states ONLY. If you have a foreign address, use an APO, live in Alaska, Puerto Rico, etc., message me for a shipping price BEFORE you buy. Due to the cost and risk of shipping I do not accept returns from outside the US. Once the package is delivered to the carrier, the foreign buyer is responsible for the item, including but not limited to taxes, fees, customs issues, delays, damage, lose, duty, etc.
Title: 2006 EPIPHONE FLYING V ELECTRIC GUITAR KORINA 1958 RI REISSUE MIK KOREA W/ CASE
